Package example.mysports.admin

Interface Summary
AdminServerConnector Interface to access the admin server.
LeagueInfo  
 

Class Summary
AdminMetadataSource MetadataSource which using REST calls to retrieve the league (tenant) specific mappings from the MySports Admin application.
League League as defined on the admin server.
Leagues Represents the list of leagues returned form the Admin service's REST call as an XML document.
RESTAdminServerConnector Utility class that provides access to the admin server using JAX-RS calls.
